Battleship Game

Hello! This is a game of Battleship. You will be playing against the computer. You can place your ships on the left board by dragging them to a suitable position. When you are done placing your ships, press "Start the game" button. The computer isn't as smart as you, so it will make its move first.

Game Over

Sorry:( Computer won! Better luck next time
